channel.title: How do you add the dragon claws special?
channel.description: does anyone know how to add the dragon claws special??? my dragon claws only hit two times:( if someone konws it please say it to me then

item.title: How do you add the dragon claws special?
item.dc:creator: @RushForum RushForum
item.source: How do you add the dragon claws special?

item.title: How do you add the dragon claws special?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Heres the solution… Better Rep++ meh!

  1. search for this:
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

should be directly near the top.

  1. now under that add:
public boolean DCDamg = false;
public int DCdown = 0;

3)now search for:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698

and should see something like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){
startAnimation(0x426);
specialAtkNPC(false, 0, 252, 0x426);
getHit(25);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
startAnimation(0x426);
usingSpecial = true;
specialAmount -= 25;
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
}
  1. Now right under that add:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
getHit(8);
usingSpecial = true;
}
  1. now for the npcs, search this from where u added the code above:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698

u should see this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426);
npcDamage(8);
}

under that add this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
npcDamage(8);
}
  1. now search for:
public boolean process() {

under that add this:

if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) {
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamgNPC(30);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}
if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) {
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamg(25);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}

now you can save and compile.

  1. open your special.java and add thsi under:
case 5698:

you will have to search case 5698: 2 times because there are 2 of them.

now under both of the 2 cases 5698: add this:

case 8002:

save and compile and you are done.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add the dragon claws special?

item.title: How do you add the dragon claws special?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Spell check …

Anyways, I have the same problem. (I mean I have the special but it only hits twice)
If you dont have a special look up “how to add a special attack” in the search bar.
